銔銔銔

銔字的基本解释

銔
pī
圆鉟。

銔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pī］
［《集韻》攀悲切，平脂，滂。］
古代旗名用字。

銔字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1305第03
【集韻】攀悲切【韻會】攀糜切，?音披。靈姑銔，旗名也。【左傳·昭十年】公卜使王黑以靈姑銔率吉。【註】王黑，齊大夫。靈姑銔，旗名也。【疏】卜使王黑以此旗率人以戰得吉也。　又【集韻】貧悲切，音邳。義同。

銔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
銔字的起名意思

暂无。

銔
Basic explanation of words
銔
pī
Round caster.
銔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pī］
["Ji Yun" is sad, flat, and peng. ]
Ancient flag names used characters.
銔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銔; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1305 No. 03
【Ji Yun】Climbing sadness and cutting 【Rhyme Meeting】Climbing Mi cutting,? Yinpi. Linggutian, the name of the flag is also. [Zuo Zhuan·Ten Years of Zhao] Wang Hei, the official envoy, led auspiciousness with Linggu. [Note] Wang Hei, Doctor Qi. Linggutian, the name of the flag is also. 【Shu】Bu Shi Wang Hei led his people to win the battle with this banner.　[Jiyun] Poor and sad, with sound. The same meaning.
